Summary: Shaped object appeared at once, brightly lit, then faded out.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sellersburg
There were no other sightings in Sellersburg on or around September 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 10:30 PM on September 20, 2012 while walking my dog, I happened to look up and saw something all of a sudden light up. It glowed bright yellow for several seconds and slowly faded. I could not determine the size, but it was large. This was not a flare or meteor, it had a definite outline. The object was about 280��� relative to my location and 30��� above the horizon, above the hills (or farther) that are 5 miles to the west. I did not see any movement, only the shape of the object. To give an idea of the shape, think of a B-2 "Stealth Bomber", at a 90��� bank, cockpit to the right. The difference is that the rear portion was a crescent instead of the faceted trailing edge of the B-2, and had a dark spot in the center. We are nowhere near an AFB or any AF practice area! My husband is a Multi-engine Pilot, (for almost 40 years) and I know what is, and is not an aircraft. I am reporting this in case others saw this and needed someone else to attest a sighting... Thank you...
